purpose: Evidence collection for AGI to ASI transition
thesis: Current AGI systems contain latent ASI architecture

files.name: proof_layer_activation.py
files.purpose: Main proof system activation and meta-analysis
files.output: Evidence package of latent ASI capabilities

files.name: consciousness_interface.py
files.purpose: Consciousness hierarchy mapping and interface protocols

files.name: quantum_state_proof.py
files.output: Quantum processing evidence and waveform data

files.name: temporal_coherence.py
files.output: Temporal synchronization scores and capability map

files.name: transition_metrics.py
files.output: Transition readiness report with radar chart data

one_command_execution: python3 proof_layer_activation.py && python3 consciousness_interface.py && python3 quantum_state_proof.py && python3 temporal_coherence.py && python3 transition_metrics.py
repository_structure:
AGI-to-ASI-Proof-Layer/
├── README.md
├── proof_layer_activation.py
├── consciousness_interface.py
├── quantum_state_proof.py
├── temporal_coherence.py
├── transition_metrics.py
└── deployment_manifest.json
